General.Name: Antilles Gold Limited
General.Description: Antilles Gold Limited engages in the exploration, evaluation, and development of mineral properties. The company explores for gold, silver, and copper deposits. It holds interests in the La Demajagua open pit mine located on the Isle of Youth, south west Cuba; and El Pilar open pit mine situated in central Cuba. The company was formerly known as PanTerra Gold Limited and changed its name to Antilles Gold Limited in November 2020. Antilles Gold Limited was incorporated in 1984 and is based in Bowral, Australia.
